verses.name: Amos 7:10
verses.text: Then Amaziah the priest of Beth–el sent to Jeroboam king of Israel, saying, Amos hath conspired against thee in the midst of the house of Israel: the land is not able to bear all his words.

verses.name: Amos 7:11
verses.text: For thus Amos saith, Jeroboam shall die by the sword, and Israel shall surely be led away captive out of their own land.

verses.name: Amos 7:12
verses.text: Also Amaziah said unto Amos, O thou seer, go, flee thee away into the land of Judah, and there eat bread, and prophesy there:
